name: 3D printer producing Private 9
description: 3D printer, currently busy printing the Private 9 plastic pistol additively. Once it finishes, activate it and deconstruct the resulting printer to get the gun.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The printer is working slowly to bring you the gun.
